original_text: Now because we eat the salt of the palace and it is not fitting for us to witness the king's dishonor, therefore we send and inform the king,
korean_text: 우리가 이제 왕궁의 소금을 먹으므로 왕이 수치 당함을 차마 보지 못하여 사람을 보내어 왕에게 아뢰오니

sentences.original_text: Now because we eat the salt of the palace
and it is not fitting for us
therefore we send and inform the king
